alert.note: Alert for Hampton, Poquoson; Newport News; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 5:11PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern York , the southwestern City of Poquoson, the City of Hampton and the City of Newport News through 600 PM EDT... At 511 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crittenden, or near Churchland, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. Locations impacted include... Newport News, Hampton, Patrick Henry Field, Christopher Newport University, Northampton, Denbigh, Tabb, Beaconsdale, Oyster Point, Oriana, Hilton Village and Menchville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
